data.Title: Google Confirms AI Overviews Affected By Core Updates
data.Description: Google's John Mueller confirms core updates impact the search engine's AI-powered overviews.

data.Title: Baidu Blocks Google, Bing From Scraping Content
data.Description: Wikipedia-style service Baidu Baike recently barred the search engine crawlers of Google and Bing from indexing its online content.

data.Title: Perplexity's Pitch Deck Offers Advertisers a New Vision for AI Search
data.Description: A new advertiser pitch deck shows how the AI search startup hopes to win over advertisers later this year with new cross-platform formats.

data.Title: Google August 2024 Core Update
data.Description: Google released its August 2024 core update on Thursday, August 15th, followed shortly after by a large search ranking bug.

data.Title: Bing Image Creator Adds New Feature to Resize Images
data.Description: Bing Image Creator users can now resize images from square to landscape.

data.Title: Reddit's Advertising Strategy and Projected Ad Revenue
data.Description: Reddit's ad revenue is projected to reach $1.1 billion in 2024. The platform is focusing on interest-based targeting via subreddits instead of personal data.

data.Title: Noindexed Pages Are Not a Sign of Low Quality
data.Description: Google's John Mueller confirms that having a lot of no-indexed pages on your site is not a sign of low quality.

data.Title: YouTube is the Most Popular Podcast Listening Platform in the US
data.Description: A Cumulus Media study found that YouTube is the most popular platform for listening to podcasts in the US, followed by Spotify and Apple Podcasts.

data.Title: Google to Migrate All Merchants to Google Merchant Center Next in September
data.Description: Google announced that it will be migrating all merchants to Google Merchant Center Next in September.

data.Title: Hardbacon.ca Shut Down After Traffic Surge
data.Description: Hardbacon.ca, a Canadian personal finance website, announced bankruptcy and shut down just as their rankings and traffic were surging due to the August core update.

data.Title: Bing Image Search Refinement Cards
data.Description: Microsoft has added refinement cards to Bing Image Search results, providing users with refinement options and example photos for refined search queries.

data.Title: Google Search Console Search Appearance Documentation Updated
data.Description: Google has updated its Search Console search appearance documentation with new details.

data.Title: Google Analytics Experiencing Data Outages
data.Description: Google Analytics is currently experiencing data outages, with missing data from recent days. However, real-time data is working.

data.Title: Unanswered Comments Don't Hurt Google Search Rankings
data.Description: Google's Martin Splitt confirms that having unanswered comments on your website does not negatively impact your search rankings.

data.Title: Google's New AI Crawler
data.Description: Google has quietly launched a new AI crawler, Google Vertex AI Crawler, for commercial AI customers. Documentation is available for site owners to track its visits.

data.Title: How to Use Google Search Console for SEO Wins
data.Description: Learn how to use Google Search Console to review your traffic, analyze the search landscape, and make impactful optimizations for quick SEO results.

data.Title: Spammers Exploiting Google with Reddit
data.Description: An SEO professional has exposed six ways spammers are exploiting Google's search results using Reddit.
